divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on my deck in Livermore Maine. Looking at stars, when one brightened and acended at about a 45 degree angle. Object did this about 20 secs. Then turned To left fast. Object falded in color, then turned red and disappeared. During this i was amased at the movement and color. It looked just like a star, until it moved. During and after i lost site, I also felt very weak and off balance. Very weird expirence.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: white star like object acended and turned red disappeared?
trends: There have been no other sightings in Livermore
This sighting has never been favorited.
